data.title: A Site Retake Dizzy from Screens
data.description: Here's a simple but effective A Site retake Dizzy from Screens that allows you to clear out the area close in front of A Screens.

data.title: Early Round Mid Support
data.description: Use this setup to support your team early, and then be ready to delay the enemy team's push through B Main with your Mosh Pit if the info your team gets leads you to that.
